document_data.name: Arangor Obarskyr
document_data.mainbody: '''Arangor Obarskyr''' was a king of [[Cormyr]] and the father of [[Azoun II]]. He was on the throne in [[1018 DR]].
document_data.Background: In the same year, while attacking a [[red dragon]] that had set [[Suzail]] ablaze, he was thrown out of his saddle and severely injured.
